name: When a POST request is sent to the /api/addBlog endpoint without valid authorization information and data, it should be verified that the status code returned is 422 and the message information in the response body is
fullName: As an administrator, I want to be able to create a new blog post via API connection.: When a POST request is sent to the /api/addBlog endpoint without valid authorization information and data, it should be verified that the status code returned is 422 and the message information in the response body is
